general.enterOTPDesc: Enter the verification code sent to

setting.confirmSignOut: Are you sure you want to sign out?

settingTutorial.step1: Your can select a language here.
settingTutorial.step2: Tap to toggle the sound effect on or off.
settingTutorial.step3: Tap here to change your account phone number or password.
settingTutorial.step4: Press the help button to replay the guide.

homeElderlyTutorial.step1: You can edit your profile information from the profile screen.
homeElderlyTutorial.step2: You can edit settings and manage your account from the settings screen.
homeElderlyTutorial.step3: The most recent relevant notification will be displayed here. You can tap to interact with it or dismiss it.
homeElderlyTutorial.step4: The modules you've select will live here. Click on the module card to access it. Click the “+” icon to add a new module.
homeElderlyTutorial.step5: Press the “Home” button to return to the home page.
homeElderlyTutorial.step6: Press the “My Caretakers” button to view and edit your caretakers.
homeElderlyTutorial.step7: Press the help button to replay the guide.

homeCaretakerTutorial.step1: You can edit your profile information from the profile screen.
homeCaretakerTutorial.step2: You can edit settings and manage your account from the settings screen.
homeCaretakerTutorial.step3: The most recent relevant notification will be displayed here. You can tap to interact with it or dismiss it.
homeCaretakerTutorial.step4: All elderlies who are connected to you will show up here. Tap “Take Care” to interact with modules specific to each elderly.
homeCaretakerTutorial.step5: Press the “Add Elderly” button to connect to a new elderly with QR code or the 6-digit code provided on the elderly’s screen.
homeCaretakerTutorial.step6: Press the help button to replay the guide.

editProfile.firstNameBlankWarning: First Name cannot be left blank
editProfile.lastNameBlankWarning: Last Name cannot be left blank
editProfile.displayNameBlankWarning: Dislay Name cannot be left blank

modules.elderlyNoModule: This elderly did not turn on any feature yet.

moduleSelection.removeConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to remove this module?
moduleSelection.reminderDesc: Create reminder for yourself or share them with caretakers.
moduleSelection.memoryDesc: Bring back good memories between elderies and caretakers through a caretaker-curated quiz game.
moduleSelection.trackDesc: Keep track of your health over time and view your trends.
moduleSelection.healthBlogDsc: Stay up to date with accurate heath information.

planSelection.elderlyCareBullet3: Connect with who you take care of

onBoarding.desc1: Please select your language to begin.
onBoarding.desc2: Create and receive reminders with customizable reminder settings.
onBoarding.header3: Stay on top of your health
onBoarding.desc3: Keep track of your health over time and view your trends.
onBoarding.header4: Notify everyone when an emergency occurs
onBoarding.desc4: In case of emergency, alert caretakers in a single tap.
onBoarding.header5: Connect between elderly user with family
onBoarding.desc5: Allow elderlies and caretakers to stay updated about each other.
onBoarding.desc6: Bring back good memories between elderies and caretakers through a caretaker-curated quiz game.
onBoarding.desc7: Select the modules and features that you want.
onBoarding.desc8: Let us know more about you by creating an account.

userLink.removeAlertBody2: ' from your caretaker list. This action cannot be reverted.
userLink.infoCard1: From the Caretaker’s app, navigate to “Add Elderly” page.
userLink.infoCard2: Scan the QR code or enter the code shown above.
userLink.cameraHelpText: Place QR code inside the scanning frame
userLink.invalidCode: Invalid code. Please try again later.
userLink.editButtonTutorial: Press “Edit” to make changes to the caretaker’s information on your device.
userLink.addButtonTutorial: Press the “Add caretaker” button to add more caretakers.

auth.otpDetail: Enter the verification code sent to {{phone}}.
auth.uploadProfileDesc: Customize your profile with your image.

emergency.callToAction: Press to Report an Emergency Case
emergency.callToActionDesc:
After pressing the SOS button, we will contact all 
your caretakersabout your emergency.
emergency.reportCompleteDesc:
Your caretaker(s) have been notified.
 Please stand by.
emergency.IAmOK: I am fine, stop the emergency report.

healthRecording.title: Title
healthRecording.fieldBlankError: This field cannot be left blank

emotionalRecord.switchLast: This is your last time to toggle emotion switch for today
emotionalRecord.switchDisabled: You cannot toggle emotion switch anymore for today

emotionTrackingCard.switchLast: This is your last time to toggle emotion switch for today
emotionTrackingCard.switchDisabled: You cannot toggle emotion switch anymore for today

healthRecordingsTutorial.step1: Press “Add more data” to create a new health recording from our featured template or your own custom template.
healthRecordingsTutorial.step2: Click on the Health Recording card to view the details and past records.

addHealthDataSuccess.body: Your health record has successfully been added.

addHealthDataError.body: Cannot record your data at this moment. Please try again later.

duplicateHealthDataError.body: A health record already exists at the selected time. Please select a new time.

confirmDeleteHealthRecordingAlert.body: Are you sure you want to deletydispe this recording?

confirmDeleteHealthDataRowAlert.body: Are you sure you want to delete the data on

deleteHealthRecordingError.body: Unable to delete this health record. Please try again later.

deleteHealthDataRowError.body: Unable to delete the data on

updateHealthDataCoverImageSuccess.body: Health record cover image has been successfully updated.

updateHealthDataCoverImageError.body: Unable to update your health record cover image. Please try again later.

addCustomHealthRecordingSuccess.body: Your health record has successfully been created.

addCustomHealthRecordingError.body: Cannot create a health record at this moment. Please try again later.

viewAssignedQuestionsTutorial.step1: Press the “Edit” button to edit the order of the questiosn or remove questions.
viewAssignedQuestionsTutorial.step2: These are your assigned questions for your elderly.
viewAssignedQuestionsTutorial.step3: Press the “Select Question from Pool” button to go to the question pool and select the questions you would like to assign to your elderly.
viewAssignedQuestionsTutorial.step4: Press “View History” button to view the records and analytic.

reminder.deleteConfirmationDesc: Are you sure you want to delete this reminder? All of the recurring reminder will be deleted.

connectElderlyError.body: Unable to connect to user. Connection may have already existed.

questionPool.noQuestions: You don't have any question yet.
questionPool.createQuestionHelper: Create a custom question or create a question from our template now!

remindersTutorial.step1: Press “Add a new reminder +” to add new reminder.
remindersTutorial.step2: Press “View Completed Reminders” button to view the reminders that you have completed.
remindersTutorial.step3: Press to hide or show the reminders in the section.
remindersTutorial.step4: This is your reminder. Click the card to view the details, or mark as complete by tapping the “Mark as Complete” button.
remindersTutorial.step5: Scroll down to view more reminders up to 1 months in advance
remindersTutorial.step6: Press the help button to replay the guide.

reminderImportanceLevel.repeatNotification3Times: Repeat notification 3 times with 10 minutes intervals
reminderImportanceLevel.repeatNotificationUnitilComplete: Repeat with 10 mintues interval until marked as completed
